Title: The Forge
Produced by:
Stephen Kendrick 
 Justin Tolley 
 Aaron Burns 
 Trey Reynolds
Starring:
Cameron Arnett 
 Priscilla Shirer 
 Aspen Kennedy 
 Karen Abercrombie 
 T.C. Stallings 
 BJ Arnett 
 Ken Bevel 
 Benjamin Watson 
 Jonathan Evans 
 Jerry Shirer 
 Tommy Woodard
Production companies:
Affirm Films 
 Provident Films 
 Kendrick Brothers
Plot: After graduating from high school without any plans for the future, Isaiah receives a push to start making better life decisions.
Cast: Priscilla Shirer as Cynthia Wright, the twin sister of Elizabeth Jordan from War Room, and will also reprise her role of Elizabeth Jordan.
Aspen Kennedy as Isaiah Wright, Cynthia's teenage son
Karen Abercrombie as Miss Clara, reprising her role from War Room
T.C. Stallings as Tony Jordan, reprising his role from War Room
Production: In November 2023, it was revealed that a Christian drama film directed by Alex Kendrick titled The Forge had completed principal photography from June to July in Albany, Georgia. Cameron Arnett, Priscilla Shirer, Aspen Kennedy, Karen Abercrombie, T.C. Stallings, BJ Arnett, Ken Bevel, Benjamin Watson, Jonathan Evans, Jerry Shirer, and Tommy Woodard round out the cast.
Release: The Forge is scheduled to be released in the United States by Sony Pictures Releasing on August 23, 2024.
